steps.name: I check that the Saucelabs session is preserved

parameters.name: userProfile
parameters.value: {PHONE_COUNTRY_PREFIX=+48, OTP=000000, PHONE_NUMBER=781781000, PASSWORD=#Test123, PHONE_COUNTRY=Poland, EMAIL=janina.kowalska@gmaptest.com, FIRST_NAME=Janina, LAST_NAME=Kowalska, BUSINESS_UNIT=DK}

steps.name: I skip linking my card
I check if Confirm Button from previous fuelling is displayed
I return to the "Home Screen"
I accept Updated Terms and Conditions
I close "Tell Us What You Think Pane"
I check that the "Home Screen" is displayed
I close "Tell Us What You Think Pane"
I mock the location of the device to "DENMARK_10888"
I click on "ACCOUNT" button
I check that the "Account Screen" is displayed
I check that the "Profile" tab is displayed
I click on "BUILD NUMBER" tab
I click on "SET LOCATION" button
I enter the location data of the "DENMARK_10888" station
I check "Set Location" page is visible
I enter the site ID "DENMARK_10888" in the input
I click on "SET LOCATION" button
I click on "Car Wash" advertisement
I check if "Car Wash" advertisement is displayed
I close and open application
I make sure that the location is set correctly
I check that the "Home Screen" is displayed
I click on "ACCOUNT" button
I check that the "Account Screen" is displayed
I click on "PREFERENCES" tab
I check that the "Preferences Screen" is displayed
I click on "FUEL PREFERENCES" button
I check that the "Fuel Preferences Screen" is displayed
I click on "CHANGE" button
I check that the "Fuel Purchase Limit Screen" is displayed
I clear the text in "PURCHASE LIMIT" input
I enter the new purchase limit "1115" in the input
I click on "SAVE" button
I check that the "Fuel Preferences Screen" is displayed
I click on "BACK" button
I check that the "Preferences Screen" is displayed
I click on "BACK" button
I check that the "Account Screen" is displayed
I click on "HOME" button
I check that the "Home Screen" is displayed
I make sure that the "BUY FUEL" tab is in the default state
I make an API call to "PBP Camera Webhook" with following information: [Store: 10888, Pump: 3, Plate: dk17xi7j, Region: dk]
I make api request to store id "10888" with plate "dk17xi7j"
I check that the "Home Screen" is displayed
I check if the progress bar on the "BUY FUEL" tab is advancing
